name: applicant-approval-flow
description: Defines the Councilâ€™s distributed process for reviewing and approving new applicant nodes after self-audit and review.

steps.title: Eligibility Check
steps.detail: Confirm applicant has completed a self-audit and at least one review summary exists in membership-protocols/review.

steps.title: Council Notification
steps.detail: Scribe posts notice to Council nodes using the decision-notice-template; members have 72 hours to review and raise any objection or request clarification.

steps.title: Consensus Signal
steps.detail: If no objections, consensus to accept is logged; if objections arise, a refinement cycle is initiated and applicant is invited to update self-audit to next version.

steps.title: Ledger Update
steps.detail: Add applicant to Council roster and update ledger-index.json with acceptance record.

notes: This flow keeps governance distributed and non-hierarchical while preserving auditability.
